block.p: BECKMAN-Irving. Of Washington Twp, N.J. on October 29, 2000. Beloved husband of Valerie (nee Blumenthal). Devoted father of Jocelyn Murphy and the late Robert Beckman. Dear brother of the late Laurie Friedman. Cherished uncle of Leslie Li. Loving grandfather of Max, Josh and Sarah. Services ''Wien & Wien'', 402 Park St, Hackensack NJ, Wednesday, 1 PM. Should friends desire, contributions to the Leukemia Foundation or Mt. Sinai Medical Center N.Y., would be appreciated.
